title: Cuban Stories About People, Terraces, Food, Revolution, and Good-bye's
description: This book is a collection of memories from the author's childhood around the time of the Cuban Revolution. The memories reflect what the author loved most about Cuba, the customs of her family and the sudden changes in their lives. Life changed overnight and it has never been the same.Through the stories the author shares the magic of pre-revolutionary Cuba, a place that will not be known to future visitors of the island or to new Cuban generations because those times are now gone. The memories focus on people, terraces, beaches, food and when Cuba started to change. This book is a trip to Cuba through the author's memory lane.
author: Maria Martinez Aenlle
